墕字的基本解释

墕
yàn
古同“堰”。

墕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yàn］
［《廣韻》於扇切，去線，影。］
亦作“墕1”。“偃2”的今字。亦作“隁1”。
(1)挡水的低坝。
(2)田边用以分界或防止水土流失的埂子。
[②]［yǎn］
［《廣韻》於建切，去願，影。］
［《廣韻》於幰切，上阮，影。］
筑堰堵塞。

墕字的康熙字典解释

【補遺】【丑集】【土字部】　墕； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页238第19
【字彙補】與堰同。漢王景有墕流法。

墕字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体

暂无。

yàn
Ancient Tong "Weir".
Groan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yàn］
["Guang Yun" cuts in fan, removes lines, and shadows. ]
Also known as "墕1". The present character of "Yan 2". Also known as "Jun 1".
(1) A low dam for retaining water.
(2) A ridge used to demarcate or prevent soil erosion at the edge of the field.
[②]［yǎn］
["Guang Yun" Yu Jianqie, Qu Yuan, Ying. ]
["Guang Yun" Yu Jiaqie, Shang Ruan, Ying. ]
The weir is blocked.

【Word Supplement】Same as weir. The King of Han Dynasty has the method of entrainment.
